description: 9x19mm ammunition with a 116gr jacketed hollow point bullet. This bullet has been imbued by a druid's will and pollen will explode on landing, which can blind and slow.
9x19mm ammunition with a 116gr jacketed hollow point bullet. This bullet has been magically shaped by an Earthshaper to turn into fragments upon impact.
9x19mm ammunition with a 116gr jacketed hollow point bullet. This bullet has been imbued with fire from a Kelvinist.
9x19mm ammunition with a 116gr jacketed hollow point bullet. This bullet has been imbued with ice from a Kelvinist and will try to freeze enemies in place.
9x19mm ammunition with a 116gr jacketed hollow point bullet. This bullet has been imbued with lightning from a Stormshaper and will bounce from enemy to enemy.
9x19mm ammunition with a 116gr jacketed hollow point bullet. This bullet has been tinkered with by a technomancer to corrupt robotics.
